The wood and geo-grid was removed, recycled and utilized by Brunswick Pipeline for use as rip-rap underlay.  Most of the corduroy along the right-of-way was removed in 2008.  In some cases it was determined that corduroy removal would be more detrimental than to leave in.
Additional Post-Construction Measures: NRemoval of • corduroy between structures 148 to 150. Reclaim access trail • by mulching and seeding area. ote: The Hanson Stream wetland appears to be in very good shape and should recover in 2009 and the following growing seasons.
